All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
App creates an HTTP server capable of interacting with the Database.
Comment
Comment is a class that represents a single comment on a single idea.
Comment.ExtendedComment
ExtendedComment is a subclass of Comment that includes the username of the commenter
Database
Database interacts with the ElephantSQL database through a set of preparedStatements and returns the appropriate result to the HTTP server App
Idea
Idea holds a row of information.
Idea.ExtendedIdea
ExtendedIdea is a subclass of Idea that includes the username of the poster and the comments associated with the idea
Like
Like is a class that represents a single like on a single idea.
Request
Generic Request type.
SessionKeyGenerator
SessionKeyGenerator is a class that generates a random string of characters to be used as a session key for a user.
StructuredResponse
StructuredResponse provides a common format for success and failure messages, with an optional payload of type Object that can be converted into JSON.
User
User holds a row of information for a user.
